
# Sentiment Analysis

- IMDB movie review dataset: Internet Movie Database
- 25000 reviews for training and 25000 reviews for testing
- 50% negative 50% positive reviews
- [Large Movie Review Dataset Homepage](http://ai.stanford.edu/~amaas/data/sentiment/). You must have the file in your directory to go further.
- [IMDB Dataset is here](http://mng.bz/0tIo). Click and downloading will be started.

- [Deep learning with Python by Chollet github](https://github.com/fchollet/deep-learning-with-python-notebooks)

- `torchtext` provides a pakage composed of data processing utilities and popular datasets for natural language (mostly English).

- [A tutorial on IMDb sentiment analysis with `torch.text`](https://github.com/bentrevett/pytorch-sentiment-analysis)
